pages.text: Through my research, I seek to find the gods - yet I fall short. Though, this endeavor has not been fruitless. This research has made the domains of the gods known to me, and offers me a possibility...
$(li)of $(l)Star$(), guardians of the night sky. $(br)$(li)of $(l)Death$(), watchers of the veil that keeps us standing. $(br)$(li)of $(l)Blood$(), warriors for justice and breakers of chains.
